## SharedInterleavedPoint2dHitTestComponent class

Where an entity makes use of shared buffers it can be indexed natively, potentially providing a significant performance boost. Otherwise equivalent to [InterleavedLine2dHitTestComponent](./cartesian-2d.interleavedline2dhittestcomponent.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SharedInterleavedPoint2dHitTestComponent<TArray extends TTypedArray> implements IHitTestComponent<ICartesian2dUpdateArg<TArray>, THitTestableSharedInterleavedPoint2dTrait<TArray>, TCartesianSharedQuadTree<TArray>> 
```
